      Methods in coupon.sys.core.facade with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method create coupon for company first check if coupon exist by title then create the coupon and insert to company-coupon
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method for purchase coupon by customer the method check if the coupon not purchased yet by customer and if the coupon out of stock and if the coupon not expired
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method remove coupon for company first check if coupon belong to company then remove the coupon from customer-coupon and company-coupon tables then remove the coupon itself
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method update coupon only for end-date and price
